scripts.dev: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=development && node config/generateConfig.js && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--inspect' next dev -p 3001
scripts.dev:qa: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=staging && node config/generateConfig.js && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--inspect' next dev -p 3002
scripts.dev:prod: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=production && node config/generateConfig.js && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--inspect' next dev -p 3003
scripts.build:dev: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=development node config/generateConfig.js && next build
scripts.build:qa: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=staging node config/generateConfig.js && next build
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=production node config/generateConfig.js && next build
